arts.ttl: Sheffield Wednesday consider late move for Plymouth Argyle loan ace
arts.sum: Sheffield Wednesday are considering Plymouth Argyle loan man Ibrahim Cissoko as a late winter signing, according to The… The post Sheffield Wednesday consider late move for Plymouth Argyle loan ace appeared first on The72 - Football League News.

arts.ttl: West Brom could free up slot to complete transfer before window deadline
arts.sum: West Bromwich Albion could bid farewell to Uros Racic this month - and in doing so it could free up another slot created for overseas signings which they'd be able to fill before the transfer window deadline on Monday evening. That could free up Racic to leave Albion this month and, while he mightn't be heading to Serie B and back to parent club Sassuolo, all parties - according to reports in Italy - are working on a solution which suits the clubs and the player.

arts.ttl: What Ousmane Diakite told Tony Mowbray as West Brom signing displays one clear trait
arts.sum: "I've got a feel of Diakite - he's a lovely guy, a nice human being that wants to get better, learn something new every day if he can," he said. The team has to try to win, I'm picking the best formula from the pieces, I hope they understand that and it doesn't mean there's any less love from me to them.
